A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A very sad day for the Star Wars franchise.  I think the Disney braintrust overreacted to people crying TFA was too much like ANH. Weve now gone 180 degrees astray. 

The biggest travesty was the disdain showed to characters that built the Star Wars legacy. Ackbar's death seemed like an afterthought. Luke became a lame old man\, then croaked. Phasma didn't see the character development that she was very much deserving. The only death I liked was that of snoke\, officially having him succumb to the "rule of two"\, so to speak.

Who knows where the franchise goes from here. What I saw as a promising start with TFA became the raging dumpster fire that is TLJ. What sad sad happenings.
